sections.heading: of ministerial officers; acts; effect
sections.text: Any duty enjoined by this code upon a ministerial officer, and any act permitted to be done by him, may be performed by his lawful deputy.SourceR.S.1867, Code § 893, p. 548;R.S.1913, § 8568;C.S.1922, § 9519;C.S.1929, § 20-2220;R.S.1943, § 25-2219.AnnotationsPerf
